{"id":324106328,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1586768714,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"204 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/324106328/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"306.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<int> cnt(200000,-2);\n        cnt[100000] = -1;\n        int ans = 0;\n        int curr = 100000;\n        for(int i = 0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            curr += (nums[i] == 1 ? 1 : -1);\n            // cout << i << \" \" << nums[i] << \" \" << cnt[curr] << endl;\n            if(cnt[curr] != -2){\n                ans = max(ans,i - cnt[curr]);\n            }else{\n                cnt[curr] = i;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
